name: Universität Wien
bossPosition: Vice Rector for Research and International Affairs
goal:
The core tasks of the University of Vienna are research
and teaching. Joining these two areas is the major characteristic of a scientific university. Therefore it is vital to promote and develop both research and teaching equally. In addition to profile development and the formation of special focuses, which are indispensable, it is necessary to ensure that top-level research is also conducted in all specialisations which are offered in the various study programme
euInitiatives: We are following all initiatives, policies and legislative files relating to research and education.
